= Installation =

{{{bash
yay -S pixivutil2
}}}

= Running =

{{{bash
pixiv
}}}


= Config =

Check [config.ini](~/.local/share/PixivUtil2/config.ini)

* Make sure to change `[Authentication]` section


= Cookies =

Cookies need to be updated every 2 months roughly

1. Login to pixiv
2. Inspect element -> Storage -> Cookies
3. Look for the value of "PHPSESSID"
    a. Copy paste that into authentication
